data.oai_dc:dc: Data on traits of endemic Madagascan plant species before and after imputation of missing values (using multivariate imputations by chained equations). Data were compiled from the literature, public databases (Madagascar Catalogue, 2013) and examination of herbarium specimens at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew (2,519 specimens) and at the Muséum National d’Histoire Naturelle, Paris (364 specimens).
